notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: The authorsâ€™ responsibilities were as follows: B.B. and H.G.R.: designed the research, analyzed the data, had primary responsibility for the final content, and wrote the paper; B.B., C.M.C.K., T.C., R.S.C., J.R.S., B.G.C., R.S.C.: conducted the animal experiments; T.C., H.L.F., P.C.C.: performed the F.A. analysis; M.A.R.V. analyzed the data and wrote the paper; and all authors: read and approved the final manuscript.
